description:
Tough on the outside, all heart on the inside, http://anidb.net/ch2 [Onizuka] turned to the life of a high school teacher for less excitement and action... or so he thought. GTO, A.K.A.: Great Teacher Onizuka, is the racy story of Onizuka, a former motorcycle gang member who becomes a teacher to make a difference and... to meet girls? Using his street smarts to deal with colleagues, students and troublemakers, Onizuka finds that he too has many lessons to learn!
Source: AnimeNfo

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi Onizuka begins his career as a teacher-in-training expecting that he will get a class of attractive, nubile high school girls. When he is assigned the problem "Class O", a group of delinquents and blackmailers, only his tough love is able to win them over.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onizuka Eikichi 22-sai! Motofuryou Densetsu no Kyouiku Jisshuu ga Ima Hajimaru!!
鬼塚英吉22歳! 元不良 伝説の教育実習が今はじまる!!

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi applies at Holy Forest Academy, and conflicts with the school`s vice principal, Hiroshi Uchiyamada. Disgusted by his condescending attitude, he leaves knowing that they never would have hired him anyway.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenteki Uchiyamada Kyoutou Toujou!! Daigyakuten!? no Saishuu Mensetsu
天敵・内山田教頭登場!! 大逆転!?の最終面接

REGULAR.description:
The new school year gets off to a rocky start for Eikichi. He has to teach middle school instead of high school students, live in a storage area at school, and rescue a student, Noboru Yoshikawa, from suicide.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoushi no Shigoto wa Inochigake?! Shin`ya no Okujou Diving
教師の仕事は命がけ?! 深夜の屋上ダイビング

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi learns first-hand what tricks his homeroom students are capable of. Yoshito Kikuchi, a computer expert, releases fake images of Eikichi engaged in BDSM and homosexual acts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kougeki Kaishi! Ima, Abakareru Onizuka no Ayashii Nichijou?!
攻撃開始! 今, あばかれる鬼塚の怪しい日常?!

REGULAR.description:
Following Anko`s "lesson", Eikichi must face the PTA for his actions. During the hearing, Noboru shows the teachers and parents the extent of his pain - physically and emotionally.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Revenge!! Me ni wa Me o, Oshiri ni wa Oshiri o
GTO - An Eye for an Eye, a Butt for a Butt
Глаз за глаз, зад за зад
悪魔のリベンジ!! 目には目を, お尻にはお尻を

REGULAR.description:
Following Anko`s "lesson", Eikichi must face the PTA for his actions. During the hearing, Noboru shows the teachers and parents the extent of his pain - physically and emotionally.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitsugyou Kakutei? Kougi Sattou, Aitsu o Kubi ni Shiro!!
失業確定? 抗議殺到, あいつをクビにしろ!!

REGULAR.description:
While preparing for parent-teacher meetings, Eikichi learns that one of his students, Kunio Murai, has a very young mother. He decides that "dates" are an excellent way to get to know the parents, much to Kunio`s dismay.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mottomo Kiken na Katei Houmon! Kaa-chan ni Te o Dasu na
最も危険な家庭訪問! 母ちゃんに手を出すな

REGULAR.description:
When Kunio and his friends are confronted by local punks, they believe they are saved when Eikichi arrives. However, he refuses to help, believing their predicament will teach them about taking responsibility.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Murai Shisu!? Kesshi no Bay Bridge Bungee!
村井死す!? 決死のベイブリッジ・バンジー!

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi goes head-to-head with the P.E. teacher Hajime Fukuroda. Meanwhile, Miyabi Aizawa enlists her friend Tomoko Nomura to frame Eikichi as an underwear thief.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onizuka and The Art of War
Unaru Kinniku! Gekitou! Onizuka vs Nekketsu Taiiku Kyoushi!
うなる筋肉! 激闘! 鬼塚VS熱血体育教師!

REGULAR.description:
Tomoko is depressed that Miyabi no longer wants her as a friend. Eikichi tries to cheer Tomoko up and enters her into a beauty contest to help her out with her self-esteem.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Watashi Nugimasu! Tomoko 14-sai Taiatari no Hatsutaiken!
私ぬぎます! 朋子14歳・体当たりの初体験!

REGULAR.description:
At the talent beauty contest, Tomoko`s clumsiness makes her a long shot to win, but discovers that being herself is her special talent.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: To Be Idolized by a Nation
Yureru F-cup! Big na Mune to Idol Densetsu!
ゆれるFカップ! ビッグな胸とアイドル伝説!

REGULAR.description:
Suguru Teshigawara, the math teacher, has his heart set only on Azusa Fuyutsuki; however, Eikichi inadvertently incurs Suguru`s wrath when he ruins Suguru`s plans to win Azusa over.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鬼塚追放! 闇の策略!

REGULAR.description:
Suguru enlists a parent lobby group to get Eikichi fired. To prove his worth, Eikichi must score the highest mark in a national scholastic achievement test.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鬼塚またまた失業確定?!

REGULAR.description:
Determined to prevent his dismissal, Azusa invites Eikichi to her place for one-on-one all-night study sessions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Between a Rock and a Hard Place
地獄? 夢の二人暮らし

REGULAR.description:
On the day of the test, Eikichi witnesses the abduction of a Diet member`s daughter and pursues the kidnappers to an abandoned warehouse.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 死闘! 血染めの解答用紙!

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi relishes his newfound hero status until he meets Urumi Kanzaki, a mischievous girl who gets him arrested as a pervert.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鬼塚マジギレ!! 強敵出現!!

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi learns that Urumi went through a traumatic childhood experience and tries to help her cope with it using his own brand of teaching.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 悪い夢! 逃亡者・鬼塚!

REGULAR.description:
Blackmailed by Urumi for pushing her off a building, Eikichi subjects himself to her whims. After meeting her former elementary teacher, Urumi goes on a classroom terrorism spree
Source: crunchyroll

Urumi`s teacher admits that she was the cause of Urumi`s mistrust towards teachers. When Urumi was younger, she accidentally revealed the secret about Urumi`s father.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鬼塚, 命がけの課外授業

REGULAR.description:
Kunio finds a love letter addressed to him, initially believing it is from Akane Fujita, a girl he likes.
Source: crunchyroll

Unable to cope with the pressures of teaching, Azusa runs away to her former school in Hakuba. Eikichi, Tomoko, Yoshito, and Kunio follow in order to convince her to return.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 教師失格? 消えた冬月

REGULAR.description:
Azusa learns that her former school will be demolished. During the countdown, a former student of the school runs into the building to retrieve a precious heirloom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鬼塚爆死?! 炎の大脱出!!

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi receives a cursed chain letter, but he dismisses it as superstition. After a series of misfortunes, he begins to believe in the letter and does whatever he can (including suggestions from Kanzaki to write spells all over himself) to dispel the curse.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鬼塚死す!? 最後の七日間

REGULAR.description:
Mr. Uchiyamada experiences a mid-life crisis, wondering if there is any meaning left to his life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chichi Aseru! Uchi no Ko ni Kagitte!!
父焦る! 家の娘に限って!!

REGULAR.description:
An attractive school nurse, Nao Kadena, arrives at the school, much to the delight of Eikichi. However, she soon starts using her looks and the school to fund her money-making schemes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: お色気先生に鬼塚クラッ

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi learns that Nao, a former street racer, was using the school to help pay her brother`s medical costs for an accident that she blames herself for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shounan no Oni vs Hakosuka no Joou
湘南の鬼VSハコスカの女王

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi becomes Tomoko`s manager and arranges a series of innocuous commercial shoots to increase her national profile.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toroko no Geinoukai Tora no Ana
トロ子の芸能界虎の穴

REGULAR.description:
From getting bōsōzoku gangs to vote for Tomoko to questionable marketing ploys, Eikichi does whatever he can to make sure that Tomoko will win the contest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Whatever Can Go Wrong, Will Go Wrong

REGULAR.description:
Before the annual class field trip, Miyabi and her friends steal the school`s trip money and blackmails the English teacher, Mr. Sakurada, into luring Eikichi to a fake "underground girls club" with the stolen money planted on him. At the "club", Eikichi was goaded into drinking beyond his limits.
Source: crunchyroll

Led to believe that he spent the school`s money, Eikichi attempts to raise the money himself while his students investigate who set him up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 罪と罰! 横領犯・鬼塚?!

REGULAR.description:
Framed as an embezzler, Eikichi promises to make it up to all of the 3rd year students with a trip to Okinawa.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 目指せ!! 憧れの沖縄行路

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi wins a Mercedes-Benz E-class sedan in a local contest, worth enough to pay for the trip. Unfazed, Miyabi arranges for a suicidal salaryman to jump in front of Eikichi`s car and ruin his chances of selling it.
Source: crunchyroll

To teach Miyabi and her friends a lesson, Urumi orchestrates their kidnapping to hold them for ransom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さらば鬼塚・22才の別れ

REGULAR.description:
When Tomoko, Eikichi, and his friend Toshiyuki Saejima find a suitcase filled with gold, they find themselves on the run from the yakuza.
Source: crunchyroll

When Kunio finds a wedding dress catalog at home, he suspects his mother will marry someone behind his back. Overprotective of his mother, Kunio will stop at nothing to stop her wedding.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 花嫁は14歳!! の息子あり

REGULAR.description:
Nao helps Azusa choose a bathing suit for the trip to Okinawa. Asuza tries to get a makeover in order to impress Eikichi, but ends up getting carried away in the process.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 冬月変身! 燃えろ夏女!

REGULAR.description:
To make it a trip to remember, Eikichi assigns his students to co-ed rooms. Noboru is perplexed with Eikichi`s decision to assign him with Anko and her friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arashi no Yokan! Okinawa de Go!

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi learns of a hidden treasure somewhere on one of Okinawa`s islands and decides that a special class trip is in order.
Source: crunchyroll

Separated, Anko and Noboru are forced to find their way to safety together. Eikichi, however, believes their disappearance was a ruse to conceal their discovery of the treasure, and searches for them in hot pursuit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futari no Bouken!! Himitsu no Doukutsu
二人の冒険!! 秘密の洞窟

REGULAR.description:
Following her ordeal, Anko is conflicted over the new emotions that she feels for Noboru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ハート直撃!! 沖縄純愛組

REGULAR.description:
Eikichi orders his class to walk through a derelict hotel as a test of nerves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 青春少女!! 初めての告白

REGULAR.description:
Miyabi confronts Noboru Saitou, the class`s former teacher, about the incident that drove them to hate teachers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ラストバトル! 蘇る傷跡

REGULAR.description:
Miyabi`s friends and teachers work to protect her from the corrupt teachers` union whose pressure on Mr. Saitou over his unprofessional relationship drove his student lover to suicide.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 挫! 愚零徒出夜露死苦!
GTO(グレート・ティーチャー・オニヅカ)
